Articles.Content:
Thanks for the kind words, all; glad to see there's still interest in the project.

I redid some details on the second stage motor. Tweaking a lot of the art right now, getting ready to texture some other components as well. Still don't have all of the parts operating correctly in game, with all the changes in the system it's been hard going. Soon

@killer420 haha yeah, I'm just an env artist on the project though.

Edited July 21, 2013 by stubbles

Thanks for the kind words, all; glad to see there's still interest in the project.

I redid some details on the second stage motor. Tweaking a lot of the art right now, getting ready to texture some other components as well. Still don't have all of the parts operating correctly in game, with all the changes in the system it's been hard going. Soon

@killer420 haha yeah, I'm just an env artist on the project though.

Its awesome!!!

Can i do a suggestion about the future?

How you think about Vostok 1 (Yuri Gagarin)...i tell this because so much spacecrafts here,but i believe missed the first manned project,and because you start with something Russian.

Anyway,keep it up my friend!

How you think about Vostok 1

Just looked it up..it's rad! Visually, it's extremely intricate and looks like it would be a blast to create. I think there are similar rockets out there, so I probably won't make the Soyuz rocket, but I'll definitely make the Vostok module & interior. Thanks for the suggestion!

Just looked it up..it's rad! Visually, it's extremely intricate and looks like it would be a blast to create. I think there are similar rockets out there, so I probably won't make the Soyuz rocket, but I'll definitely make the Vostok module & interior. Thanks for the suggestion!

Yes,you right,i speak only about module and interior,i am happy think about this module!

This link,maybe help a little.

Thanks!

http://gagarin3d.com/

Awesome, thanks so much for the link, Cerverus!

I made some tweaks and additions to the BlockDM engine component and Primary stage one engine (RD-171):

Edited July 21, 2013 by stubbles
Damn that looks good!

These are some lovely models, I really like that upper stage. Russian rocketry just looks cool.

Also I gotta take note of some of your low poly techniques.

@Kommitz - thanks man I checked our your nuclear rocket dev thread and gotta say that's some sweet stuff as well.

I decided to redo some of the old modules like the ASAS and stage 1/2 decouplers, since they were sharing textures with the larger fairing texture. Since textures are exported per model, it was exporting a huge texture for a tiny mesh, even though it was only using a small part of the texture

Here's the redone normals/AO for the ASAS module and the normal texture itself, in case anyone wanted to see it:
Yea, this will get all of my money!
Bro,i don't have words...i am your fan!!!

Too kind!

Finished up the ASAS:

And the textures, for those interested:

I authored them at 256x256, but I'll probably package it at 128x128

Edited July 21, 2013 by stubbles
Impressive stuff! Can't wait to have this in-game.

Indeed....

I LIKE THE HOTNESS.

Spoiler tags no longer seem to work? Was nice to compact image posts. Oh well.

I managed to finish up the Stage2 Decoupler texture.
Are you planning to make anything after finishing the Zenit3-SL?

Are you planning to make anything after finishing the Zenit3-SL?

Yeah, probably a continuation of Russian space tech. The Vostok-1 capsule will likely be next. I don't know any programming, I'm just an artist, so I can't do any real fancy mod type stuff.

One word; OMG

(Okay, basicly it's three words)
Man if your stuff is this good in KSP i cant wait until Forza 5
These parts look absolutely amazing! I can't wait to see more of this, including Vostok!

Are you taking suggestions on future projects? Because I love the look of your work so far, and would love to see a PPTS in the same style and quality

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prospective_Piloted_Transport_System
This looks amazing, especially the fairings! Some of the textures remind me of Star Trek Online.

Thanks for the kind words, all; glad to see there's still interest in the project.

Definitely. I subscribed to the thread when I saw it a few weeks ago. Everything looks awesome so far!
Starting to work a bit on the normal maps and textures for the RD-58M in the blockDM section.
Wow! Looking good! Wil DL when your done.

Starting to work a bit on the normal maps and textures for the RD-58M in the blockDM section.

is it bad that I want to make love to this, looks straight sexy! One thought on the foil should it radiate inwards from the outer edges?
